text: Sanga, allahacya adesace palana kara, paigambarance ajnapalana kara, tarihi jara tumhi tonda phiravile tara paigambarace kartavya tara teca ahe, je tyacyavara anivarya kele gele ahe ani tumacyavara tya gostici jababadari ahe, ji tumacyavara takali geli ahe. Margadarsana tara tumhala tyaca veli labhela, jevha paigambarance ajnapalana svikara karala. (Aika) paigambarace kartavya kevala spastatah pohacavine ahe
